descriptionHtml:
Well if you like my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75665?]Cheat Spells[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75666?]Fun Spells[/url] then just use this. Is is both mods combined into one mod. If you want the Skyrim Special Edition version go [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/1013/?]here[/url]Â And if you play Oblivion also look at my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/oblivion/mods/28894?]Oblivion Cheat And Fun Spells[/url].

Requirements
Skyrim
[url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url]

To install just download then extract folder and drag plugin, and bsa into your data folder.
author: LegoManIAm94
